description: This file contains a JUnit 4 smoke test class designed to verify that the test discovery process works correctly in environments where JUnit 5 is not configured. The test class includes a single test method that always passes, ensuring at least one test is discovered and run.

classes.name: SmokeJUnit4Test
classes.description: A simple test class with a single test method to verify JUnit test discovery and execution.

methods.name: testAlwaysPasses
methods.description: A test method that always passes, used as a smoke test to confirm test discovery.
